unlockable.CubePounce.Description.translation: With this upgrade, Cozmo learns how to play Cube Pounce, a game of reflexes and reaction time.

unlockable.FaceEnrollment.Description.translation:
With this upgrade, Cozmo learns to remember faces and speak names.

Find this in the Meet Cozmo activity.

unlockable.Simon.Description.translation: With this upgrade, Cozmo learns how to play the Simon music game.

unlockable.SpeedTap.Description.translation: With this upgrade, Cozmo learns how to play the game Speed Tap. Over time, his skills will improve!

unlockable.CubeRollAction.Description.translation: With this upgrade, Cozmo gains the ability to roll Cubes if he sees one on its side.

unlockable.DroneMode.Description.translation: With this upgrade, Cozmo will allow you to pilot him in Explore Mode.

unlockable.CubeStackAction.Description.translation: Get Cozmo to Stack two Cubes

unlockable.KnockOverThreeCubeStack.Descr.translation: Knock Over Three Cube Stack Described in detail here.

sparks.PressAndHold.translation: Press and hold to ask Cozmo to do this.
